# Zoning Administration Division

__

#### Department of Planning and Development Alert:

CONTACT INFORMATION:  Our offices are open 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., Monday through Friday.

703-324-1314 TTY 711

ordadmin@fairfaxcounty.gov

12055 Government Center Pkwy.  
Fairfax, VA 22035

__

Leslie Johnson  
Zoning Administrator

# Zoning Ordinance Work Program

The Zoning Ordinance Work Program (ZOWP) or Work Program is adopted by the Board of Supervisors annually and establishes the priorities and timing for the development of amendments to the Zoning Ordinance. The amendment requests originate from the Board of Supervisors, Planning Commission, Board of Zoning Appeals, citizens, industry representatives, and county staff. In addition to the Work Program, the Priority 2 list consists of those amendment requests that will be reviewed for future inclusion on the Work Program.

The Zoning Ordinance Work Program for fiscal years 2025 and 2026 was endorsed on July 30, 2024, for a two-year cycle. Recognizing that Zoning Ordinance amendments often require more than one year to complete, including research and community outreach, the ZOWP is presented for a two-year cycle with annual updates to ensure that the Work Program continues to reflect the Board’s priorities.

Information regarding the Work Program and the Priority 2 list can be found below:

## 

ZOWP

##  2024 

FY 2025-2026 Adopted Work Program

FY 2025-2026 Adopted Priority 2 Work Program

Memorandum to Board of Supervisors Land Use Policy Committee

Estimated Timelines

##  2023 

FY 2024-2025 Adopted Work Program

FY 2024-2025 Adopted Priority 2 Work Program

Memorandum to Board of Supervisors Land Use Policy Committee

Estimated Timelines

Report to Board of Supervisors on Accessory Living Units and Home-Based Businesses (Work Program Item #1A)

##  2022 

FY 2023-2024 Adopted Work Program

FY 2023-2024 Adopted Priority 2 Work Program

Memorandum to Board of Supervisors Land Use Policy Committee

Estimated Timelines

Report to Board of Supervisors on Accessory Living Units and Home-Based Businesses (Work Program Item #12B)

Report to Board of Supervisors on Agritourism and Related Changes

##  2021 

FY 2022-2023 Adopted Work Program

FY 2022-2023 Adopted Priority 2 Work Program

Estimated Timelines

##  2020 

2020 Adopted Work Program

2020 Adopted Priority 2 Work Program

metadata.description: Fairfax County, Virginia - The Zoning Ordinance Work Program (ZOWP) or Work Program is adopted by the Board of Supervisors annually or biennially and establishes the priorities and timing for the development of amendments to the Zoning Ordinance.
